name: Colorful Slider - Casual Game
description:
Intro

"Colorful Slider" through sliding to play is very easy. In particular, I added color reaction rules to make the game more complex and fun.

After AI testing the board size from 3² to 7², I determined that 3×3 is the most appropriate. The small space allows players to slide more strategic. It's easy to play consistently, but it takes a lot more wisdom to get a high score.

Controls

Web: direction key ↑ ↓ ← → 

Mobile: slide screen

Use the remove tool: double click

Color Reaction Rules
